thread.title: BRIEF-PJT Partners Q4 Loss Per Share Of Class A Common Stock $1.98​

title: BRIEF-PJT Partners Q4 Loss Per Share Of Class A Common Stock $1.98​
text:
February 7, 2018 / 12:05 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-PJT Partners Q4 Loss Per Share Of Class A Common Stock $1.98​ Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - PJT Partners Inc: 
* PJT PARTNERS INC REPORTS FULL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 10 PERCENT TO $190.6 MILLION 
* PJT PARTNERS SAYS INTEND TO REPURCHASE NEARLY 534,000 PARTNERSHIP UNITS FOR CASH IN FEBRUARY 2018 * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK $1.98​ 
* QTRLY ADJUSTED NET INCOME, IF-CONVERTED PER SHARE $0.79‍​ 
* PJT PARTNERS - ESTIMATED IMPACT OF TCJA IN QUARTER WAS $24.7 MILLION RISE IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE DUE TO REMEASUREMENT OF U.S. DEFERRED TAX ASSETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
